altTitles.ja: 獣人領主の偏愛ペット～今世では俺が飼い主だから

altTitles.en: Juujin Ryoushu no Hen'ai Pet - Imayo de wa Ore ga Kainushi dakara

description.en: "Let me overtake their scent." The Beast Master is overly devoted to me, and I'm going to be his pet starting today...!

altTitles.ja: Lord El-Melloi II Case Files
ロード・エルメロイⅡ世の事件簿

altTitles.vi: Bí ẩn trong thế giới ma thuật

description.en:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
description.ru: Часовая Башня — центр магического мира и штаб-квартира «Ассоциации магов», хранящей секреты бесценных таинств. Преподающий здесь лорд факультета современной магии, Эль-Меллой II, по стечению определённых обстоятельств оказывается втянут в борьбу за наследие Замка Разделения, Адра. Только разгадавший тайну ангельских имён, что были даны всем приглашённым и встречаются в нём повсюду, сможет получить его «наследие». Однако даже для высокопоставленных магов Часовой Башни это дело оказалось не простым решением головоломки, а началом волшебного, но в то же время печального инцидента.С этого дела началось досье лорда Эль-Меллоя II, в котором переплелись магия и таинства, иллюзии и загадки...

title.en: I Rely On Plug-Ins To Hunt Gods

altTitles.en: I Rely on Cheat to Hunt Gods

description.en: Main character Zhang Yi was betrayed by his best friend and lover, he was then reborn back to the day [Apocalypse] arrived. With his memories from his past life, Zhang Yi will challenge God at the opening. In order to gain the strength to defeat the people that betrayed him, Zhang Yi will use his knowledge to obtain a God-weapon, and begin to grow stronger and stronger, at the same time exploring the unknown secrets of the apocalyptic world…
description.zh: 主角张奕在上一世天启八年遭到兄弟和爱人的背叛而死，重生后回到了【天启】降临的那天。凭借着上一世的记忆，张奕在开局得到了亿里挑一的神级天赋。为了能够手刃背叛他的敌人，张奕利用天赋与从上一世带来的超级神器，在这一世开始追逐更为强大的强大，同时也开始探索关于天启世界那些不为人知的秘密……

title.en: Fuku wo Kiru nara Konna Fuu ni

altTitles.ja: 服を着るならこんなふうに

altTitles.en: Do It this Way If you Wear the Clothes.
If You're Gonna Dress Up, Do It Like This

altTitles.vi: Đã ăn diện thì phải ăn diện sao cho đúng.

description.en: Yuusuke, an average office worker meets with his friend at a reunion, only to find out that the fashion world has left him behind. Now, with the help of his sister Tamaki, Yuusuke must take his step into the world of trends and charisma.
description.pt-br: Yuusuke, um trabalhador de escritório comum encontra-se com seu amigo em uma reunião, apenas para descobrir que o mundo da moda o deixou para trás. Agora, com a ajuda de sua irmã Tamaki, Yuusuke deve entrar no mundo das tendências e do carisma

description.en: Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.

altTitles.ja: ナルト
-ナルト-
NARUTO -ナルト-

altTitles.th: นินจาคาถาโอ้โฮเฮะ

description.bg: Тайното село Коноха. Проблемният възпитаник на Нинджа академията Наруто и днес не спира с белите! Огромната мечта на същия този Наруто е да приеме званието на историческия герой Хокаге и да стане нинджа, като надмине всички предишни Хокаге. Ала около раждането на Наруто изглежда витае една тайна...!?
description.cs: Stát se nejlepším nindžou na světě není věc snadná, dokonce ani když nejste obecně zatracovaný outsider, který má v sobě zapečetěného devítiocasého démona, jenž kdysi málem srovnal se zemí celou nindžovskou vesnici. Naruto je však pevně odhodlaný splnit si tento sen a vzdát se za žádných okolností nehodlá. Nejspíš proto, že neví, co to slovo znamená (a prakticky určitě ho nedokáže správně napsat).
description.de: Naruto ist ein berüchtigter Tunichtgut in seinem Dorf, das fast ausschließlich aus Ninja besteht. Er liebt Nudelsuppe und spielt anderen gern Streiche. So ist es kein Wunder, dass er nicht gerade beliebt ist. Doch gerade deshalb will er der beste Ninja seines Dorfes werden. Zu diesem Zweck gehen er und seine Mitschüler Sasuke und Sakura beim großen Meister Kakashi in die Lehre...
description.en:
Before Naruto's birth, a great demon fox had attacked the Hidden Leaf Village. The 4th Hokage from the leaf village sealed the demon inside the newly born Naruto, causing him to unknowingly grow up detested by his fellow villagers. Despite his lack of talent in many areas of ninjutsu, Naruto strives for only one goal: to gain the title of Hokage, the strongest ninja in his village. Desiring the respect he never received, Naruto works toward his dream with fellow friends Sasuke and Sakura and mentor Kakashi as they go through many trials and battles that come with being a ninja.  


---
description.es:
En la Villa Oculta de la Hoja, un chaval de lo más problemático que estudia en la escuela de ninjas, Naruto, se dedica a urdir gamberrada tras gamberrada. El sueño de Naruto es el de llegar un día a heredar el nombre de Hokage, reservado a los grandes héroes, y de convertirse en el mejor ninja de todos los tiempos. ¿¡Podrá Naruto llegar a cumplir sus anhelos de grandeza...!?

---
La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.fi:
Konohan ninjakylässä ilman vanhempia varttunut Naruto Uzumaki on ninjakoulun heikoimpia oppilaita. Mutta Narutossa piilee voimia, jotka ylittävät inhimilliset rajat... Naruto on vauhdikas seikkailutarina ninjanuorukaisesta ja hänen ystävistään, taisteluista, toveruudesta ja kunniasta. Sekä kotimaassaan että ulkomailla huippusuosittu sarja pohjautuu taruihin Japanin historian mystisistä ninjasotureista. 

Sarjakuva etenee takakannesta etukanteen ja oikealta vasemmalle. Suositellaan yli 12-vuotiaille.
description.fr: Naruto est un garçon un peu spécial. Il est toujours tout seul et son caractère fougueux ne l'aide pas vraiment à se faire apprécier dans son village. Malgré cela, il garde au fond de lui une ambition: celle de devenir un maître Hokage, la plus haute distinction dans l'ordre des ninjas, et ainsi obtenir la reconnaissance de ses pairs.
description.id: Ini adalah Desa Konohagakure... Naruto adalah salah satu murid di Akademi Ninja yang suka berbuat onar!! Impian Naruto adalah menjadi seorang Hokage. Tetapi, Naruto memiliki rahasia sejak lahir karena di dalam tubuhnya terdapat siluman rubah yang disegel! Inilah petualangan Naruto untuk mewujudkan impiannya...
description.it:
"Naruto" è incentrato sulle avventure di un ragazzino, Uzumaki Naruto, che vuole diventare un famoso ninja e lasciare un segno nella storia. Gli ostacoli sul suo cammino sono però molti, come le prove che dovrà sostenere e i rivali che dovrà affrontare...

---
Naruto Uzumaki è un ragazzo dodicenne del Villaggio della Foglia che insegue il sogno di diventare Hokage, cioè il ninja più forte, nonché capo del villaggio. Il giovane custodisce in sé un segreto di cui lui stesso è all'oscuro: all'interno del suo corpo è sigillato un demone, conosciuto come Volpe a Nove Code, che attaccò il villaggio dodici anni prima e fu sigillato dal Quarto Hokage in cambio della vita. Per questo motivo, Naruto è stato sempre associato allo spirito demoniaco ed è cresciuto isolato da tutti. Dopo l'ennesima bocciatura di Naruto all'esame dell'accademia per il diploma di Genin, il suo maestro Iruka Umino lo salva dal maestro traditore Mizuki che lo aveva spinto a rubare un rotolo contenente delle tecniche proibite. In questo frangente, Naruto scopre finalmente il suo segreto. Questo, unito al desiderio di salvare Iruka, gli dà la spinta necessaria a sconfiggere Mizuki con la Tecnica Superiore della Moltiplicazione del Corpo, appresa dal rotolo. Grazie a questa dimostrazione di coraggio, il ragazzo riesce a guadagnarsi la promozione a Genin ed entra a far parte della Squadra 7 insieme a Sakura Haruno e Sasuke Uchiha, sotto la guida del maestro Kakashi Hatake.
description.ja: ここは木ノ葉隠れの里。忍術学校の問題児、ナルトは今日もイタズラ三昧！！　そんなナルトのでっかい夢は歴代の勇者、火影の名を受けついで、先代を越える忍者になることだ。だがナルトには出生の秘密が…！？
description.pl: Osada Konoha-gakure. Naruto, uczeń szkoły dla ninja, rozrabia jak tylko potrafi! Mimo to, jego marzeniem jest pokonanie "Hokage", czyli aktualnego przywódcy wojowników. Gdy Naruto się rodził, wydarzyło się coś, o czym on sam wciąż jeszcze nie wie...
description.pt: La aldea escondida entre las hojas está habitada principalmente por ninjas, y entre ellos uno se destaca por sobre todos los demás por ser el más desobediente y quilombero: ¡¡Naruto Uzumaki!! El sueño de Naruto es convertirse en el hokage, el líder de los ninjas, y que todos reconozcan su fuerza; pero el secreto de su verdadero origen puede que sea demasiado difícil de superar.
description.ru: Двенадцать лет назад, мощный Девятихвостый Демон-Лис напал на деревню ниндзя, Коноху. Демон был быстро побежден и запечатан в младенце по имени Наруто Узумаки. Но для этого, главному ниндзя Конохи, четвёртому хокаге пришлось пожертвовать жизнью… Теперь, по прошествии 12-и лет, Наруто является номером один среди придурков ниндзя, который полон решимости стать следующим Хокаге и получить признание всех, кто когда-либо сомневался в нем!
description.sr: Jedan od najpopularnijih naslova širom sveta sada je konačno dostupan i domaćim čitaocima. Serijal prati avanture dečaka Naruta, koji pokušava da postane veliki ratnik i nadmaši sve prethodnike. Ali moraće najpre da se bori sa samim sobom.
description.tr:
Naruto, ünlü mangaka Masaşi Kişimoto tarafından yaratılan, 1999 yılından beri Japonya’da yayınlanan dünyaca ünlü manga serisi artık Türkiye’de.

Bugüne kadar Japonya’da 100 milyondan fazla satan Naruto serisi, 2002 yılında bu başarısı taçlandırarak animeye uyarlandı. Ülkemizde de gösterilen bu anime, manga kültürünü dünyaya tanıtıp; Naruto’yu dünyadaki en önemli mangalardan biri haline getirdi. Yıllardan beri geniş bir hayran kitlesi tarafından Türkçe’de yayınlanması beklenen bu eser, manganın özünden hiçbir şey kaybetmemesine özen gösterilerek ve Japonya’da olduğu gibi sağdan sola okunacak biçimde hazırlandı. Yediden yetmişe herkese hitap eden Naruto, çizgi roman kültürü ile ilgili olmayanların bile severek okuyabileceği bir eser.

altTitles.en: Placebo Memories

description.en:
[Woojin, who has lost his memories x Hamin, who has had an unrequited love for 13 years] 

An accident occurs where Woojin forgets 13 years worth of memories with Hamin. This causes a lot of panic for Hamin, as he has harbored unrequited feelings for him for those 13 years. Seeing this reaction, a misunderstanding occurs where Woojin believes that they are dating…

altTitles.en: Gyeoggi 3 ban

description.en:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)

Sesame saves Rice Cake in the park, and they part ways. Rice Cake saves Sesame in the park, and this time, they become friends after Rice Cake's owner takes in Sesame. They become friends, but will that friendship progress to something more? Oh, and they're cats. GL series, infrequent updates (translator made description)  
Author Weibo: <https://www.weibo.com/xllb0118?refer_flag=1005055013_&is_all=1>

title.en: Fushigi na Neko no Machi Meltier

altTitles.en: The Curious Cat Town

altTitles.ja: ふしぎな猫のまち メルティア

description.en:
This is "Meltier," a town of cats. Moko, who has no memory of her past, ends up helping out at a coffee shop in town. There, she meets many unique and fun kittens and friends! A little bit mysterious and extraordinarily happy. A heartwarming fairy tale fantasy of everyday life!

---
Note: Has an original song sung by the author herself called はじめまして、世界！

altTitles.ja: ボールルームへようこそ

description.en:
An ordinary middle school student, Fujita Tatara couldn't find any objective in life and spent his days idly.   
One day, a group of delinquents picks a fight with him and he is saved by a mysterious man.  
After that, the man surprisingly takes him to a ballroom dancing class. While being inspired by a girl dancer who goes to that school, Hanaoka Shizuku, and her partner, a genius dancer, Hyoudou Kiyoharu, Tatara starts dedicating his youth to dancesport.  
  
Note: 6th and 8th Manga Taisho Award nominee.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18982)

title.en: Unaware His Majesty Is a Girl

altTitles.vi: Hoàng đế bệ hạ là nữ lang

altTitles.my: ဘုရင်ကြီးကမိန်းကလေးမှန်းမသိခဲ့ဘူး

altTitles.vi: Không Ngờ Bệ Hạ Là Nữ

description.en:
The new emperor, Qi Nian, acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort, brushing them off by saying "the affairs of state are important, and I am busy with my work". But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" spread ever more widely.

Yu Dingdang was a particularly dim-witted girl, but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Madame Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Who could have expected that Yu would be selected by the emperor to be his empress consort?

A happy and dramatic girl-girl romantic comedy set in the imperial palace. Yu couldn't have expected that this lofty emperor up on high was actually a girl?!
description.zh: 新帝祁念登基多年，却终日以“国事要紧，朕沉迷工作”，拒绝了朝臣们的选妃请求。但“皇帝不行”的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不胜其烦，终是松口。玉玎珰出身名门，却生了个榆木脑袋，众人纷纷道：“玉家小姐是拿脑子换的脸”却不想，一朝入选，她竟成了国母。玉玎珰表面：啊？什么？是我吗？内心却汹涌澎湃。只因玉玎珰从小便立誓，一！定！要！成！为！祁！念！的！女！人！迷妹追星成功，在皇宫里上演了一系列“她逃她追，她插翅难飞”的啼笑皆非的欢喜故事却不想，这高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女儿身？！
description.zh-hk: 新帝祁念登基多年，卻終日以“國事要緊，朕沉迷工作”，拒絕了朝臣們的選妃請求。 但「皇帝不行」的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不勝其煩，終是鬆口。 玉玎璫出身名門，卻生了個榆木腦袋，眾人紛紛道：「玉家小姐是拿腦子換的臉」卻不想，一朝入選，她竟成了國母。 玉玎璫表面：啊？ 什麼？ 是我嗎？ 內心卻洶湧澎湃。 只因玉玎璫從小便立誓，一！ 定！ 要！ 成！ 為！ 祁！ 念！ 的！ 女！ 人！ 迷妹追星成功，在皇宮裡上演了一系列「她逃她追，她插翅難飛」的啼笑皆非的歡喜故事卻不想，這高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女兒身？ ！

altTitles.ja: ウスズミの果て

altTitles.en: The End In Diluted Ink
Mission In The Apocalypse

description.en:
A girl walks alone in a world without humans.
Her mission is to search for survivors and cleanse the land.
Will humans be found?
A story of loneliness and beautiful ruins.
___
[Alt Official Raw (KADOComi)](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000736_S?episodeType=first)
description.fr: Dans une métropole post-apocalyptique déserte criblée d'une matière mystérieuse, une jeune fille recherche tout signe de vie et des provisions.
description.tr: İnsanlığın yok olduğu bir dünyada dolaşan yalnız bir kız hakkında kıyamet sonrası bilimkurgu macerası.

altTitles.ja: ジャンケットバンク

description.en: "Junket Bank" is a manga of a gambling place operated by a bank. Mitarai, a bank clerk bored with his every day duties. One day, Mitarai went to the basement of the bank while thinking that something was wrong with his new boss Usami, but witnessed gambling there...

altTitles.ja: 今日、好きっていいます

altTitles.en: Today, I Will Say I Love You

description.en:
University student, Rintarou, is in love with his rental boyfriend, Asahi. Knowing that it is all pretend doesn't stop his heart from racing when confronted by Asahi's kindness. Every time they meet, his feelings continue to grow stronger.
One day, as Rintarou finds himself unable to make another rental appointment out of concern he won't be able to stop his feelings from growing, he stumbples across Asahi in town. While Rintarou is taken aback by the uncharacteristically serious look on Asahi's face, Asahi starts leaning in for a kiss...?!

Fifth chapter is a completed oneshot known as KOI WA KITSUNE MOUYOU.

title.en: A Marriage of Convenience: The Love Between a King and Queen

altTitles.ja: 白い結婚　－王と王妃の恋ものがたり－

description.en: The tale of a wife who loves her husband, and an older husband who knows what's right. This manga is aimed at young women.

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.zh-hk: 靈甲鬼修羅 - 避邪回歸

description.en: "On the beautiful Jeju Island, MiHo Won, a beautiful teacher, and Van, a cold and mysterious guy, become entangled in strange events, fighting unknown monsters. A legend of exorcism comics is back as webtoon!"

title.en: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King

altTitles.en: The Survival Story of the Sword King in Another World
Otherworldly Sword King's Survival Records

altTitles.ru: История выживания короля меча в фэнтезийном мире

altTitles.ja: 異世界剣王生存記

altTitles.th: การเอาชีวิตรอดของราชาดาบในต่างโลก

description.en:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

**Links:**
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLzbAKkDpYM)
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%84-%EA%B2%80%EC%99%95-%EC%83%9D%EC%A1%B4%EA%B8%B0/2363)

description.fr: Transféré contre sa volonté dans un tutoriel où il doit lutter pour survivre, Ryu Hanbin y reste finalement coincé pendant 22 ans. Il est bloqué par un bug au niveau 4, et ce malgré la grande quantité d'XP qu'il accumule ! Quand il est finalement transféré dans le monde de Latna, le contraste entre sa puissance et son niveau lui pose bien des difficultés. Mais finalement, le véritable objectif n'est-il pas de vivre plutôt que de survivre ?
description.ja: ｢あなたは適合者として選ばれました｣ ｢あなたの能力でセルハラトナに生き残る確率は５％未満です｣ ｢自殺しますか？」 ニート生活から突如として異世界へ飛ばされた！そこはレベル5までを目指す初心者エリアだったが、「ガイドライン」のエラーでレベル5になっても再びレベル1になるという、地獄の日々を送ることになり？！ レベル5の裏に隠された、とてつもない能力とはー
description.ko:
『귀하는 적합자로 선택받았습니다』

『귀하의 재능으로 셀하 라트나에서 생존할 확률은 5% 미만입니다』

『자살하시겠습니까? Y/N』

“x-까.”

5% 미만의 생존 확률. 22년의 시간. 셀 수도 없는 마견과의 사투.
이 지옥에서, 나는 홀로 살아남았다.

5라는 레벨 뒤에 감춰진, 무지막지한 히든 스탯들과 함께!

대검 하나로 이계를 썰어버리는,
사상 최강의 레벨5 검사 류한빈의 극한 사이다 생존기!
description.ru: В момент, когда его переместили в другой мир, Рю Хан-Бин был обычным человеком, который недавно вернулся из армии. Хоть он и остался один в пустынном мире с кучей монстров, ему дали задание - стать сильнее. Но есть одна проблема - "система", которая должна была давать подсказки, полна недоработок.
description.th:
รยูฮันบิน ชายผู้เพิ่งปลดประจำการทหารมาได้เพียงสามเดือน จู่ๆ ก็ถูกพาไปยังโลกแปลกๆ ที่เขาไม่รู้จักมาก่อน ชื่อว่า 'เซลฮา แลตนา'
พร้อมมีข้อความขึ้นว่า ""คุณได้รับเลือกในฐานะผู้เข้าเกณฑ์อันทรงเกียรติ"" พร้อมกับไกด์ไลน์ที่บอกให้สู้กับมอนสเตอร์ และเพิ่มให้ถึงเลเวล 5 เพื่อไปยังพื้นที่ถัดไป แต่ด้วยระบบเกิดข้อผิดพลาด ทำให้เขาต้องติดอยู่ในนั้นนับสิบปี ที่นั่นมีเพียงเขาแค่คนเดียวกับสุนัขปีศาจ
อยู่มาวันหนึ่งเขาสามารถเพิ่มถึงเลเวล 5 ได้สำเร็จ และถูกส่งไปยังพื้นที่ต่อไปแบบไม่ทันตั้งตัว

การผจญภัยเพื่อหาทางเอาชีวิตรอดในต่างโลกของเขาได้เริ่มต้นขึ้นแล้ว
เขาจะหาทางออกไปจากโลกแห่งนี้ และมีชีวิตรอดไปได้หรือไม่
description.zh: 一个俗套的穿越后带挂升级故事，却因为外挂系统的运算错误而偏离方向。 渴望变强的他被困在新手村二十年，不断的战斗却始终无法提升等级。 九亿次拔剑，九亿次搏杀，他脚踩着尸山血海缓步走来。 “恭喜，您即将被传送出新手村…” 蛰伏的凶兽露出爪牙，万物都将屈服于他拔剑的光辉之下！
description.zh-hk:
「依照你的能力，
你在瑟哈拉特那活下來的機率低於5%。」

「你要自殺嗎? Yes or No?」

「三X啊。」

不到5%的生存機率、22年的時間、
與魔犬纏鬥了無數次，
我一個人...在這座地獄中生存了下來。

在5等的背後，潛藏著無比強大的隱藏數值!

帶著一把巨劍殺爆異界，堪稱史上最強的5等劍士，
柳寒頻生存記，看了保證超過癮!

altTitles.en: You've crossed the line

description.en: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

altTitles.ja: 背後霊に告白する話

altTitles.en: A Story about Confessing to the Ghost behind Me

altTitles.es-la: una historia sobre una confesión a un fantasma acechador

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.tl: Sa isang partikular na paaralan ay may isang natatanging klab at ang tatlong tagapamahala nito. Bagama't hindi kapansin-pansin, ay nagsimula na ang mga araw na kahit saan ay hindi matatagpuan! Iginuhit ni Souichiro Yamamoto, ay isang bagong kuwento ng mga kabataan sa larangan ng isports!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It
Hidden Love
My Secret Crush

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

description.en: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
description.ru: Чэн Янь прошел сквозь время и попал в мир, подобный Средневековой Европе, став Роландом, 4-м принцем королевства. Но этот мир не такой, к какому он уже привык. Ведьмы и магия здесь — нормальное явление. Сможет ли Роланд заполучить трон короля и решить выпавшие на его долю проблемы? Только его опыт современных технологий и помощь ведьм, известных как «слуги Дьявола», позволят ему добиться успеха!

title.en: The Reincarnation of the Influential Courtier

altTitles.en: Rebirth of the Imperious Official

description.en: Each book is a debt of love. Each step forward is a mortal challenge.

title.en: Yowaki na Kimi to Nagai Shiawase

altTitles.ja: 弱気なきみと永いしあわせ

altTitles.en: Eternal Happiness With a Shy Boy Like You

description.en:
Tsukino Ryou, a university student, was questioning himself: "...Am I attracted to men?" 

He wants to put himself out there, so he signs up for a gay Sex Community, "Polaris". However, on the day he meets his partner, when they're about to go to a hotel... He gets cold feet. 
The one who suddenly appears there is a handsome man he had seen somewhere before. 
The man, Shinji, who is also a Polaris member, takes him out of there, and sends him home, saying: "Don't come back." 

For a short while, Ryou is relieved that he doesn't have to have sex with a stranger. But the next day, he discovers that Shinji is a senpai who goes to the same university. 
Ryou attempts to thank Shinji for helping him out, but...

title.en: I Became the Target of the Harem in Another World

altTitles.zh: 我竟成了异世界后宫的采集对象

description.en: The dimensional wall is broken. Secret books, magical equipment, and spiritual beasts have descended, and the world has entered an era of hegemony. I want to hide, but a girl from another world comes to my door to collect my...

title.en: After Listening to What Inside My Mind the Female Leads Want to Flung Into My Harem

altTitles.zh: 反派: 被偷听心声后 女主想当 我后宫!?

altTitles.zh-ro: Fanpai: Bei Tou Ting Xinsheng Hou, Nv Zhu Xiang Dang Wo Hougong!?

altTitles.en: The Villain: After Eavesdropping on My Thoughts, the Heroine Wants to Be in My Harem!?

altTitles.vi: Nhân Vật Phản Diện: Sau Khi Nghe Lén Tiếng Lòng, Nữ Chính Muốn Làm Hậu Cung Của Ta!

altTitles.zh: 反派：女主偷听我心声人设崩了

title.en: Koibito Ijou no Koto wo, Kanojo Janai Kimi to.

altTitles.ja: 人以上のことを、彼女じゃない君と。

altTitles.ja-ro: Koibito Ijou no Koto o, Kanojo ja Nai Kimi to

altTitles.en: Being More than a Lover to You, Who Isn't My Girlfriend
How to Be My Ex-girlfriend's Friend

altTitles.es-la: Cómo ser el amigo de mi exnovia

description.en: Having to deal with his abusive boss day after day while working an exploitative job, Yamase Fuyu has become tired of it all… Until one day he accidentally runs into Kei, his ex-girlfriend from university. The sudden reunion lifts Fuyu’s spirits, who wastes no time inviting Kei to chat over drinks. The two have a whale of a time sharing gripes and reminiscing about the past. But just as Fuyu begins to appreciate their new relationship as “just friends,” they end up spending an intimate night together…
description.es-la:
Fuyu Yamase, un joven adulto cansado de su agotador trabajo llama a su ex novia en la universidad, Ito Minase, para tomar unos tragos. Comieron, rieron, recordaron anécdotas de la universidad; eso hizo que Fuyu piense que esa relación con Ito era perfecta, sin embargo, tragos van, tragos vienen y terminaron ‘haciéndolo’. 

Arrepentido por lo sucedido, Fuyu trata de disculparse con Ito pero ella piensa que está bien lo que sucedió, ya que no hicieron nada malo, al contrario, fue algo divertido porque ambos se sintieron cómodos. Ito estaba cansada de lo complicado que es era ser en la vida por ser una adulta, por lo que ambos deciden tener una relación donde simplemente se diviertan sin preocuparse por el trabajo o el amor.

altTitles.ja: 白物語
カッパ少年紅介〜昭和妖怪恋物語

altTitles.zh: 河童少年红介~昭和妖怪恋物语~

altTitles.ja: いとこのお姉ちゃんに甘えちゃう？

altTitles.en: I'll Be Spoiled by My Big Sis Cousin?

description.en:
***A heart-pounding new life together with my "big sis cousin"!?***

Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. 
Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?
A slightly naughty, living together romcom begins under one roof!!

(Source: Ultra Jump)

---

Serialization published in Ultra Jump starting in the June 2024 issue, released on May 17th, 2024.
description.ja:
セクシーすぎる“いとこのお姉ちゃん”とドキドキ新生活！？

高校進学を機に、親戚の家に居候することになった大泉将人。
そこには距離感が近すぎる“いとこのお姉ちゃん”が居て……!?
一つ屋根の下、ちょっぴりHな同居ラブコメディ開幕!!
description.es-la: Una Comedia Romántica entre Primos, Un chico que apenas comenzó el Instituto y Una Onee-chan que ya va en la Universidad, esto definitivamente te encantará~

altTitles.ja: お狐ギャルの片喰さん

description.en:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun.
Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?

The struggle between Kamou-kun, who doesn't want to be bothered, and Katabami-san, who craves attention, begins anew today!

---

**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)

altTitles.ja: キモオタ、アイドルやるってよ

description.en: "When I woke up this morning there was a beautiful girl, but that was… me!?" - Idol Otaku Aisaka Yousuke wakes up one morning and realizes he's now a beautiful girl named Aisaka Yoko. Now with his new appearance and his great Idol knowledge, he will attempt to become the number one idol.

title.en: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner

altTitles.en: Dogs Bully Their Masters

altTitles.th: เจ้าสุนัขตัวโตรังแกเจ้านายอีกแล้ว

description.en:
[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."

Two years ago, Yu Sui had his teammate sold out, and had himself criticized by the public. He didn't care about any of it. The only thing he cared about was the kid on his team, Shi Luo. After coming back to China, the two meet again. Yu Sui is starting a new team – will Shi Luo give himself once more to the one who hurt him before? Can there be a new path for their relationship?  
  
"I met you when we were young, and then I lost and found you again. My regrets vanished long ago."

title.en: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!

altTitles.en: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!

altTitles.ru: Да будет благословенен этот прекрасный мир!

altTitles.th: ขอให้โชคดีมีชัยในโลกแฟนตาซี

altTitles.ja: この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！

altTitles.zh: 为美好的世界献上祝福！

altTitles.en: Bless This Wonderful World!

description.en: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
description.es:
Kazuma Sato es un hikikomori que disfruta como un bellaco con los videojuegos, el manga y el anime. Un día decide salir de su casa, sufre un desafortunado accidente y fallece. Cuál es su sorpresa al ver que aparece en un limbo junto a una diosa llamada Aqua que le ofrece enviarlo a un nuevo mundo con tintes roleros y -además- concederle un deseo. Pero antes, Aqua se ocupa de humillarlo porque la muerte que él pensaba que había sido heroica salvando a una chica de ser atropellada, resulta ser lo más patética y cutre que te puedas echar a la cara. Lo único que se le ocurre al bueno de Kazuma es usar su deseo para que Aqua lo acompañe al nuevo mundo y se una a él en sus peripecias para derrotar al Rey Demonio.

En su nueva aventura encontrará una gran variedad de personajes a cada cual más cazurro, formando equipo con la pesada de Aqua, con Megumin, una maga loca por las explosiones y con Darkness, una paladín aficionada al sadomasoquismo. Viendo que su equipo está mal de la cabeza y que todas son más tontas que un zapato, Kazuma decide disfrutar de su nueva vida a lo grande, pero al final se las tendrá que ver con los generales del Rey Demonio que se cruzarán en su camino… y con sapos, un montón de babosos batracios.
description.ru: Кадзума Сато - хиккикомори, закоренелый фанат игр, аниме и манги. В какой-то момент, в попытке спасти человека он попадает в дорожную катастрофу и его жизнь обрывается. Казалось бы жизнь закончилась? Но Кадзума просыпается и видит перед собой красавицу, которая называет себя богиней. Она спрашивает, хочет ли он отправиться в другой мир? С условием, что он может взять с собой только одну вещь. Кадзума сразу же желает взять с собой богиню. Так и начинается его невероятное приключение против короля демонов, но перед этим нужно заняться другими делами. Например, найти пищу, одежду и убежище. Кадзума хочет жить в мире и спокойствия, но богиня находит одну проблему за другой. А кроме того, армия демонов имеет какие-то свои виды на него.
description.pt-br: A vida de Satou Kazuma, um hikikomori que gosta de jogos, muito em breve chegou ao fim por causa de um acidente de trânsito... Deveria ser, mas quando ele acorda, uma linda deusa aparece diante de seus olhos. "Ei, eu tenho algo um pouco agradável para você. Quer ir para outro mundo? Você pode desejar apenas uma coisa de sua escolha junto com você." "Então eu irei levá-la." Daqui em diante, a grande aventura de subjugar o Rei Demônio começará para Kazuma reencarnado, ou assim se poderia pensar, mas é o trabalho para a obter alimentos, roupas e abrigo começa! Apesar de Kazuma querer viver em paz, a deusa acaba causando problemas, um após outro, e eventualmente, eles atraem a atenção do exército do Rei Demônio.

altTitles.ja: カジノグイ

description.en:
Gen Suzuki, a young man who grew up in an orphanage, is trying to live an honest life.  
But when the cruel reality of the 10 million yen debt from her sister hits him, he decides to rob a Dark Casino.  
What awaits him is the baptism of the underworld!

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム バトルオペレーション コード・フェアリー

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy

description.en: The "Noisy Fairy Squadron, a secret unit under the direct control of Kycilia Zabi of the Principality of Zeon, is deployed somewhere in the North American continent. With only female members, they fight in the One Year War against the Earth Federation Forces. They are forced to face the unreasonableness of war and the bonds with their comrades...

altTitles.en: Yuri Zero Distance

description.en: Two girls switch bodies after not seeing each other for years. Carefully guarding the secret, they learn the truths of once inexplicable things…

altTitles.ja: 若き２人の悩み

altTitles.en: The Worries of Two Young Women
Mid-Ut

description.en:
As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...

description.en:
'Cha Ju-young' is imprisoned in a juvenile detention center for rendering his gangster father comatose.
Not long after, the father, who was thought never to wake up, comes to visit...
description.pt-br: Cha Ju-young’ está preso em um centro de detenção juvenil por deixar seu pai gangster em coma. Pouco tempo depois, o pai, que se pensava que nunca acordaria, vem visitá-lo…

altTitles.ja: 累

description.en:
Beautiful people are loved and revered. They have everything they desire right at their fingertips…  
Even if that beauty is a complete illusion.  
  
Before Kasane's mother died, she was given a special tube of lipstick from her mother. She was told that if times ever got really really hard, she should wear the lipstick and kiss whatever she really desires.  
  
But is this keepsake a blessing? Or a curse?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/darumaym)

altTitles.ja: ティードラゴン

description.en:
A sci-fi where the bar for suspension of disbelief is set very high.  
  
Nakamaru Koutarou, a high schooler and skilled kendo practitioner, has his peaceful life shattered when a mysterious virus with a 94% infection-fatality rate puts Japanese society on the verge of collapse and threatens the whole world. Right when his little brother is infected, he is scouted by an organisation at the forefront of Japan's last ditch-effort against the virus: miniaturise a company of daredevil soldiers to capture the new life form that acts as carriers for the pathogen, so they can be used as a source for a vaccine/antiserum!  
  
No kidding. Enjoy.

altTitles.ja: 理想の彼女

altTitles.en: Ideal Girlfriend

description.en:
Saeki is an ordinary high school boy with a girlfriend, Sara, who is the heiress of the Saionji Group, and whose beauty and intelligence are the envy of everyone.

Sara seems like a prim and proper young lady to other people, but the two share a secret! Because of the secret, Saeki can't fully commit, but Sara prepares lunch for him, she hugs him to deepen their relationship, and she acts like she's trying to seduce Saeki to corrupt him!!!?

What is the secret of their relationship and what is Sara's true purpose…!!? A love comedy about a young lady disguising herself, and a boy in an enviable situation!

(Source: ComicWalker)

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67455)
description.ja:
誰もが羨む美貌と知性を持つ、西園寺グループのお嬢様・紗良…を彼女に持つ冴えない男子高校生・佐伯。

他人にはクール＆ツンしか見せない絶対零度のお嬢様な紗良と仲睦まじい関係を築いているが、実は二人にはある秘密があった!!
そんな秘密を抱えているのもあり、中々踏み出せない佐伯をよそに、紗良は彼のためにお弁当を用意したり、関係を深めるために抱きしめ合ったり、佐伯を堕とそうとするようなアプローチをしかけてくる!!!?

二人の恋人関係の秘密とはいったい、そして紗良の目的とは…!!? お嬢様との羨ましすぎる、複雑Hな偽装ラブコメ!!!!

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.ja: タワーダンジョン

description.en:
The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom, the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower," a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky, but they are blocked by powerful demons.
A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel, and when a young man is sent to the tower, the wheel of fate begins to turn.

Tale of sword & sorcery and labyrinth exploration begins!
description.pt-br:
Para salvar a princesa Ignelia que foi sequestrada por um necromante, o Batalhão da Guarda Real se aventura pela “Torre do Dragão”, uma estrutura gigantesca que costumava flutuar no meio do céu, mas são bloqueados por criaturas poderosas. 
Uma ordem de recrutamento é enviado para uma aldeia vizinha para repor os soldados feridos, e quando um jovem é enviado para a Torre, a roda do destino começa a girar.

Começa a história de espadas, feitiçaria e exploração do labirinto!

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: 白聖女と黒牧師

altTitles.vi: Thánh Nữ Cecilia và Mục Sư Lawrence

description.en:
What’s a priest to do when the Saint he’s tasked to take care of is…a  klutz? One thing’s for sure…every day is bound to be lively!

Saint Cecilia is beloved by the townspeople — not only is she elegant and composed, she benevolently shares her wisdom with all who seek it. That is, until the last person has left — at which point she becomes totally hopeless!

Only Pastor Lawrence is keeping the Saint put together enough to do her duties… and though she may test him, it’s all in a day’s work!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10178/episode/324516) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2256-saint-cecilia-and-pastor-lawrence-1-4)
description.vi: Thánh nữ Cecilia có một bí mật - đó là cô sống hoàn toàn phụ thuộc vào Lawrence, mục sư của nhà thờ. Ngoài ra cô còn có một tình cảm bí mật đối với Lawrence, nói bí mật cho oai thế thôi chứ ai cũng biết riêng chỉ có Lawrence là không biết thôi
